title: When someone claims to be a girl
body:
https://66.media.tumblr.com/afadf1c54efbe5d9828270256bfca73f/tumblr_ms4l8wbb0Y1qme5q7o1_400.gif
There are two types of people in this game. Men who admit to being men, and men who get their jollies by pretending to be women.

replies.body:
But I'm so pretty!
http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/7caa76a6098a78b554f0a3f05ae246e7.jpg

I'm going to use that against you in the future 
https://media.riffsy.com/images/abd38ecb8bce758f495160e54a1ea7ab/raw
https://media.giphy.com/media/umuDPcy78IbkY/200.gif
I'd https://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/mtgsalvation.gamepedia.com/thumb/b/be/T.svg/70px-T.svg.png?version=26b41e18847d58be70fe7be7c93014fb that...
https://media.giphy.com/media/11sgX4ByWpwzle/giphy.gif
At least SOMEONE got it!
http://gifsec.com/wp-content/uploads/GIF/2014/07/i-got-you-gif.gif?gs=a

Hey can I leave my Sylveon with you? KAY THANKS! *leaves*

https://i.gyazo.com/7b00bcadbed599f8060546b015fe7e5f.gif

Lies!
We all know I'm the prettiest Iron Maiden here!
http://66.media.tumblr.com/79168394bd3cb3877775a9752bc58125/tumblr_n5bgcbHaIE1rfduvxo1_500.gif

Now that is a fight I would want to see
http://rs162.pbsrc.com/albums/t277/bbanana06/gifs/123_creepysmile.gif~c200

Oh god I can see the Morde x Morde ships starting.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/tmnt/images/9/9e/Shipping-goggles-on.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140701200422
*Hues seductively*

Too late
https://media.giphy.com/media/ktAQNsUfigR1K/giphy.gif

But I **am** a girl
http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/945f33fac77b843c0b27abc9b0205e6d.jpg
http://orig07.deviantart.net/27bf/f/2014/179/e/3/caitlyn_league_of_draven__by_armice-d7obown.jpg
http://orig13.deviantart.net/4dd4/f/2012/297/1/7/elise_league_of_draven__by_armice-d5isehh.jpg
http://orig07.deviantart.net/d9c3/f/2012/210/c/3/orianna_league_of_draven__by_armice-d5914hv.jpg
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/QECNON-8kn0/maxresdefault.jpg

I admit to being male.
I don't pretend to be female.
People still claim I'm female.

(- -_- -)
Embertine went though that once :P
In our defense, the avatar Embertine always uses to represent him is female. Confusion was inevitable.
You can't say that after making a post like this :/

It looks like I just did...
https://media.giphy.com/media/qzmjxMUa5L6GA/giphy.gif
https://media.giphy.com/media/1CLBGBQ1lM3QI/giphy.gif

Did you just assume my gender?

https://blueollie.files.wordpress.com/2014/12/triggered.jpg
your first problem was giving a shit about some random internet persons sex.
I don't think anyone in memes and games is actually giving a shit. This is a chill place for jokes and shenanigans
No to me it seems like Fish really does care.
https://media.giphy.com/media/g2h2gaBLJp1n2/giphy.gif
I'll also be leaving the club until you stop caring since it really seems to bother you.

LOL, you actually left!
http://www.confusedsandals.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/julia-roberts.gif

Why are you so angry?
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/BfbTOhnSCvc/hqdefault.jpg
Cause you're an asshole.

Well that is not nice
http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m6rbd4kkcq1ron04jo3_250.gif
You called my mother a mule :/

Correction: You attempted to insult me, failed, and so you called me an asshole for it. 
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/disneycreate/images/c/c1/10-looking-around-suspicious.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140606230452

If you are going to run around insulting me, at least do it well. Hit me with something good next time.
http://memeguy.com/photos/images/mrw-a-game-has-no-restart-feature-so-i-have-to-die-in-order-to-try-again-15359.gif

So you call my mother a Jackass instead? Who you know IS DEAD, the least you could do is show a little respect.

Oh wait I forgot you don't have a respectful bone in your body.

How the *hell* would I know your mother is dead? 
http://rs423.pbsrc.com/albums/pp315/decredico/AngelEyes.gif~c200

You do know when I call myself a god I am joking right? I can't *actually* know all things, so there was no way I possibly could have known that. You really need to calm down dude.

That's what happens when you assume, you make an Ass out of u and me, just like you ASSUME i'm a guy because of how I act and what I say, you don't know that you never will know that because i'm NEVER going to let you know that.

STOP IT GUYS!!! This is Memes & Games! It's a 

http://images.travelpod.com/tw_slides/ta00/d56/5bc/safe-place-sign-vero-beach.jpg

Holy SHIT. Stop it. Both of you. Raptor, you're acting like a child. Yes he didn't really have a right to insult your mother but there was no way he could have known she wasn't with us anymore. And Fish? Christ man, I expected more from you. You're showing us your truer colors now aren't you? A real ass who can't accept someone insulting you. Yeesh, this is sad innit?
I'm sorry
Mom? Dad? Please stop fighting.
http://gifrific.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/06/Boy-That-Escalated-Quickly-Anchorman.gif
Why am I not in this club?!?

Nah, I don't think anybody actually cares if some random person online is male or female. I just wanted to put some more "games" into "Memes and Games". 

https://31.media.tumblr.com/5ff7487e8baafb6adcb7a7a2d7e40e8e/tumblr_inline_n868q0yxbd1sjvw3v.gif
Im starting to think they need to change Memes and Game to Games and Gifs
Please don't feed the Fish's superiority complex anymore >.>
https://media.giphy.com/media/HwZTaW7y35FQY/giphy.gif
welcome to the internet where men are men, women are also men and kids are secret FBI agents
B-b-but they're memesters...t-they're not meant to fight!?
https://media.giphy.com/media/8CP1ayeGSL4w8/giphy.gif
I never said I was a girl :3
Nor should you have, because you are not.
